article_title: Allen on trial for wife's beating murder
article_text: Opening statements were made in the trial of Patrick Allen who is charged with the murder of his wife Kimberly. The woman was found in her Middletown home with a dented frying pan next to her body. VIDEO EDITED BY THOMAS P. COSTELLO

article_summary:
Opening statements were made in the trial of Patrick Allen who is charged with the murder of his wife Kimberly.
VIDEO EDITED BY THOMAS P. COSTELLO
The woman was found in her Middletown home with a dented frying pan next to her body.
